profile:
DAVESDUCTS (formerly DAVE'S DUCT CLEANING)are CERTIFIED members of the NATIONAL AIR DUCT CLEANER'S ASSOCIATION (NADCA), HRAI, TSSA and Ambassadors of the QUALIFIED AIR DUCT CLEANING AFFILIATION (QUADCA) We are also an ACCREDITED BUSINESS listed with the BETTER BUSINESS BUREAU (BBB), AN OFFICIAL BAEUMLER APPROVED CONTRACTOR an OFFICIAL AIR MILES Reward Miles Sponsor and are the OFFICIAL DUCT CLEANING PARTNERS of HABITAT FOR HUMANITY Durham and Greater Toronto Area.

SERVICES INCLUDE: Furnace and AC Repair, Service and Installation, Tankless Water Heater Installation, HVAC installation and Design, Indoor Air Quality, AEROSEAL Duct Sealing and NADCA Certified Duct Cleaning

STANDARDIZED PRICING: $379 + tax up to 16 vents, each additional vent is $5

Give us a call at 416-668-4607 or email info@davesducts.com, we PROMISE we won't let you down!

-----------
FOLLOW US ON INSTAGRAM! www.instagram.com/davesducts
LIKE US ON FACEBOOK!
https://www.facebook.com/davesductsinc
service_area:
DID YOU KNOW?
- our rate is standardized for residential duct cleaning: $299 + hst up to 15 vents, each additional vent is $5.
- for crawlspaces, multiple furnaces, condos, commercial buildings, industrial spaces, furnace blower/ac coil cleaning and dryer vent cleaning - please call 416-668-4607 or email info@davesducts.com
- we want you to be happy with our service, if there is anything that you are not happy with before, during or after our service; let us know - we'll be happy to correct it; we want you to know that we value your business and will always ensure we perform this service properly and thoroughly for you and your home.
- we encourage you to shadow us as we work; we have nothing to hide; we want you to know everything about the work we are doing in your home so if you've got questions...ask away!
- all our air duct cleaning technicians have passed numerous background checks for your security, comfort and peace of mind! We are all BackCheck verified!
- we believe that consumers have the right to know everything about the services they're receiving in their home; QUADCA was created to help and protect consumers from "blow and go" air duct cleaning companies - we are the official QUADCA Ambassador for the Greater Toronto Area. Visit www.quadca.com for more information!
- for a company to be considered NADCA certified, they are only required to have 1 ASCS (Air Systems Cleaning Specialist); We have EIGHT (8) ASCS Technicians and NINE (9) VMTs (Ventilation Maintenance Technicians) to serve you and your home!
- we also have (6) SIX CVI (Certified Ventilation Inspectors) on staff that can inspect your residential, commercial or industrial HVAC systems.
- NADCA publishes the names of individuals that hold the ASCS designation, make sure your home is being cleaned by a certified and qualified individual; to find out if your technician is certified, please visit: www.nadca.com
- ASCS is the HIGHEST level of certification you can possess; VMT is the bare MINIMUM level of certification your cleaning technician should possess
- We will only send ASCS cleaning technicians to perform our service in your home!
- we DO NOT sub-contract our work and DO NOT telemarket
- we maintain 3 vehicles, 1 inspection vehicle and have 10 employees on payroll with full health benefits
- we are members of WSIB and have $5M in comprehensive business liability insurance
- we provide PROOF OF WORK by taking before/after pictures; this is the only way we know an HVAC system is thoroughly cleaned!
- your service should take between 2-3 hours with a 2 person crew (based on a 2000-3000 sq ft home)
- we are only able to accommodate 3 jobs maximum per day per vehicle
- if a job takes longer than anticipated to complete, we will always stay as long as it takes to complete the job properly and will always advise our customers accordingly
- your service can be performed with either truck mounted, van mounted or portable HEPA filtered vacuums; all these machines conform to NADCA standards and will yield the same results: CHECK OUT THIS VIDEO: http://bit.ly/1h78y0X
- the length of time it takes to clean an HVAC system is NOT dependent on type of equipment used; provided equipment conforms to NADCA standards
- time it takes to clean an HVAC system is dependent on: 1) ACCESS 2) SIZE OF HVAC SYSTEM 3) TYPE OF HVAC SYSTEM 4) OTHER SERVICES PERFORMED - each HVAC system is different and should be treated as such!
- NADCA certified professionals have the ability to properly assess, maintain and restore all types of HVAC systems
- your vents should always be sealed during the cleaning process
- when done properly, your HVAC system need not be cleaned for at least 5-7 years (under normal living conditions).
- for more information, we've compiled various resources (videos and cleaning standards) to educate you and your family better, copy and paste the following link: http://www.davesducts.com/faq/consumer-education

To view our service area map, copy and paste the following link: http://bit.ly/U3Pt5c

For references (as early as today) or questions about your HVAC system or just to say 'hello' - please call! (416) 668-4607 or visit: www.davesducts.com - WE LOOK FORWARD TO SERVING YOU AND YOUR HOME!

profile:
It’s the Right Time to call Peel Heating and Air Conditioning!

We've changed our look, but not our commitment to you. Peel Heating and Air Conditioning is now part of the Right Time Group of Companies and will continue to serve you as we have for years. Rest assured, we will continue our personalized customer service and honour all of our service plans, guarantees and warranties. We look forward to serving you and your home comfort systems.
service_area: Brampton, Concord, Etobicoke, Markham, Mississauga, Newmarket, North York, Oakville, Richmond Hill, Scarborough, Thornhill, Toronto, Unionville, Vaughan, Woodbridge
products: furnaces , air
services:
Furnace Repair Service: Whether your unit stops working on your way to work or the middle of the night, our experts will be out to fix your furnace in no time. Our NATE-certified technicians have earned the most prestigious training and certification in the industry, so they’ll get the job done right the first time. Our expert professionals at Peel Heating Service Experts in Brampton are trained to service any type of furnace or boiler, so you can be certain you’ll get the best service out there.

Furnace Sales & Installation: Purchasing a new furnace is a big deal. How do you know where to begin? Don’t worry. Our expert heating and cooling consultants will help you determine which unit will work best for you based on the size of your home, your family’s air quality preferences, financing budget and your desired energy efficiency. We’ll have someone work with you as much as you need from finding the best system and financing solution, to executing an expert equipment installation when it arrives

Furnaces & Air Handlers: If you’re searching for a replacement furnace or air handler, look no further than Peel Heating Service Experts in Brampton. We sell a wide range of gas furnaces, oil furnaces, air handlers, boilers and garage heaters – and all our products rate well for efficiency, low noise levels and, of course, long-lasting performance. Look through our full range of products here on our website.

Furnace Maintenance: You can’t always prevent your furnace from breaking down, but you can help prevent it with regular furnace maintenance visits. Our in-depth furnace tune-ups and PLUS service plans actually help you save in two ways. First, a well-maintained heating system will operate more efficiently and uses less energy, which helps the environment. Second, proper maintenance means less spending on repairs. We don’t know about you, but there are things we’d prefer to spend money on instead of our heating. And with lower energy expenses, we can!

AC Repair Service: AC Repair doesn’t have to be an annoyance. Sure, you’re probably not in your happiest moment when you need us, but rest assured, we’re here to take care of any AC repair issue that arrives. We’re certified to service all brands of air conditioners, so you know you’ll be getting the finest AC repair around. And with a written 100% Satisfaction Guarantee you have nothing to lose.

New Air Conditioners: The time has come to finally take the next step to updating your home’s air conditioner. Upgrading your current system is actually more affordable than you may think, so why wait? We’ve made it easy for you to schedule a FREE estimate too. Just fill in your information and we’ll work with you to make your home cool, energy efficient, and the most comfortable it has ever been.

Air Conditioning Maintenance: So you’ve got your thermostat programmed perfectly but you’re still not happy with your energy bill every month? Much like cars, AC maintenance is critical to ensure your home is running at its top efficiency. We’ve created four service plans to meet your particular AC maintenance need, and your budget.

Solar Air Conditioning: We won’t bombard you with a bunch of “green” terminology, but you should know that solar air conditioning is a lot more realistic and practical than you make think. We have many solar air conditioners that can take your home to the next level of efficiency and also provide your wallet with a little more green as well. While you shouldn’t stare into the sun, you should definitely take a look into harnessing all the power it delivers.

Air Conditioners: We all love being comfortable. Keeping your home cool plays a large part in your family’s comfort in the heat of the summer and we’re here to help ensure you maintain the level of comfort your want. Choosing one of our ENERGY STAR® qualified air conditioners will keep your home the perfect temperature while giving you a quiet and efficient system that helps reduce your carbon footprint at the same time.
There are a variety of leak and clog-related issues that can come up when it comes to your home’s plumbing, so take advantage of the skill that Peel Heating Service Experts can provide. You can put your mind at ease knowing that our understanding and experience will leave you with a stress-free plumbing service and give you peace of mind.
name: Peel Heating & Air Conditioning

profile:
AtlasCare has been a family-run local business for 88 years with one goal: to always be there when you need us. As an essential service, we may be needed now more than ever. A breakdown or necessary replacement of your HVAC or plumbing system can be critical - especially as many of us are still confined to our homes. At AtlasCare we are dedicated to the health and safety of our team members, our customers and our community. That's why we're taking extensive precautions before we enter your home bu disinfecting trucks and tools, washing hands, wearing proper protection equipment, and disinfecting anything we touch. Most of the work we do does not require any interaction with customers - approvals and payments are contactless. 
⁣
When you book an appointment:⁣
⁣
- We send you a photo of the technician who will be visiting your home. ⁣
- We let you know we’re on the way and show up on time. ⁣
- We lay down a red carpet and wear booties over our shoes to protect your floors. ⁣
- We clean up when we’re finished so you’d never know we were there.⁣
⁣
Since 1932, families in the Greater Toronto Area have counted on AtlasCare to provide exceptional ⁣
heating, cooling and ventilation products, including furnace repair, air conditioner service, water heater ⁣
maintenance, smart thermostat installation, plumbing, drain clearing and more.⁣
⁣
Our exceptional service and support team has received recognition from numerous consumer and industry ⁣
awards, including:⁣
⁣
- HomeStars Best of 2020 Award (GTA) ⁣
- Top Choice Air Conditioning and Heating Company of 2020 in the Greater Toronto Area ⁣
- 2020 Consumer Choice Award for Air Conditioning and Heating Contractors in the Greater Toronto Area ⁣
- 2019 Mississauga and Brampton's Readers' Choice Award ⁣
- 2019 Lennox Partner of the Year Award (Toronto District)⁣
⁣
Call AtlasCare 24/7 for award-winning furnace, air conditioning, plumbing or duct cleaning service in the Greater ⁣Toronto Area.

profile:
Save thousands by dealing directly with a manufacturer! Canadian Choice Windows and Doors Inc. is a leading manufacturer of windows in Canada, serving Ontario. Canadian Choice Windows and Doors offers a huge selection of replacement windows including energy efficient windows, vinyl windows, casement windows, awning windows and bow and bay windows.

Canadian Choice Windows and Doors has been serving Toronto, Richmond Hill, North York, Markham, Mississauga, Oakville, Burlington, Hamilton, Kitchener, Cambridge, Niagra Falls and the surrounding areas as well as in Calgary, Edmonton, Winnipeg and Northern Ontario. 

Why is Canadian Choice Windows and Doors your best solution for window replacement?

1. No Pressure Estimate: take your time & make informed decision

2. Save Money: Energy Star windows will reduce your energy bill by 30 %

3. Professional Installation: flawless installation and thorough clean up by courteous installers

4. High Quality: The highest quality windows in the industry, featuring foam injected honey comb structure.
 
5. Easy Financing: Financing solutions to fit anyone’s lifestyle

6. Maximum Comfort: low-E coating to reflect summer sun and retain winter heat with our Cardinal Smart Glass system.

7. Zero Maintenance: our windows are easy to clean from within the home and will never fade or discolor

Canadian Choice Windows and Doors is your smartest solution for window and door replacement.

Air In Motion Heating + Cooling is an established company with a proven track record. We specialize in comfort solutions and also respond quickly to no heating calls, no cooling calls, leaking water heaters, and we service and install furnaces, air conditioners, water heaters, thermostats, indoor air quality products resolving indoor air quality issues or problems with mould, ventilation and other indoor air common problems. We have 17 years of experience in this industry and deliver the best quality workmanship. Any HVAC Issues big or small Air In Motion Heating + Cooling is the company to call. We also have a Master Electrician and a Certified Plumber on staff as well to help you with any issues you have with your electrical or plumbing needs at home from replacing electrical panels, safety inspections, replacing toilets, sinks, fixing leaks or installing hot water tanks to boiler systems.

profile:
We are qualified full-service HVAC and Electrical Contractor, providing optimum Heating, Air Conditioning, Indoor Air Quality and Electrical Services to residents of Toronto since 1997. 
Our electricians are Master Electricians and our HVAC technicians are natural gas, propane and oil certified.
When you work with us, you have confidence that all installation, replacements and repairs carried out to comply with manufacturer instructions, and all the regulations with regard to Electrical(ESA), and Gas & Refrigeration(TSSA) are taken into account.

For more than 20 years, we build our business trust and reputation, by providing the best products and services to our clients. We design fully customized Heating, Cooling and Electrical solutions for every customer, providing the best match for your needs and budget.
If you are interested to get your new heating or cooling system with easy and low monthly payment plans, we are partner with Financeit, which is a leading company in financing.

Call (416)-822-9030
Whether you live in a heritage home or a newly built home, you can trust House Depot Home Services for the best results for your ultimate satisfaction.

profile:
At Reliance, the safety and well-being of both our Customers and our Team Members is always our top priority. We are actively monitoring the Coronavirus (COVID-19) situation and are taking precautionary measures to aid in keeping our communities safe. We have implemented strict safety protocols to provide both our Customers and Team members with peace of mind during this challenging time. We continue to provide the exceptional customer experiences we are synonymous for and want you to know that we are here for you when you need us.

Reliance Home Comfort has been delivering high quality home comfort products and services for over 40 years. Specializing in furnaces, air conditioners, water heaters and plumbing, we provide our customers with peace of mind and are with you every step of the way. When you choose Reliance, you’re choosing one of the largest HVAC providers in Canada, with over 1.7 million customers and growing. You can expect your call to be answered 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year. With one of the largest networks of licensed technicians in Canada, we respond to over 500,000 service calls each year. 
After all, we believe you are investing in much more than home comfort equipment, you’re investing in a relationship and your satisfaction is our top priority.
888-837-1451 is a TOLL FREE No., please feel free to contact!!

profile:
Aeroseal Tech specializing in Aeroseal Technology and other ways  to improve Air Quality, Air Volume and Velocity for residential and commercial buildings. We take on jobs ranging from simple to complicated and perform all work with the utmost attention to detail and customer service. This way we are able to achieve the best results for our customers which we guarantee for 10 years!
Aeroseal Duct Sealing is a patented breakthrough technology that tackles leaks from the inside out. Aeroseal software allows the technician to accurately measure the duct leakage in residential homes and commercial buildings. The Aeroseal process puts escaping air under pressure and causes polymer particles to stick first to the edges of a leak, then to each other until the leak is closed.

The technology was developed within the Indoor Environment Program at Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory, whose IAQ scientists tested it. The research was funded by US Environmental protection agency, US dept. of Energy, Electric Power Research Institute and California Institute of Energy and Environment.

The University of California was granted initial patents in 1996 and 1999, and Aeroseal holds an exclusive license to the technology.

********OPEN FOR BUSINESS**********

Covid-19 Update:

As the spread of the Coronavirus (COVID-19) dominates the headlines, we wanted to let you know we are thinking about you and hope you and your families are safe and healthy.

The health and well-being of our employees, customers, and partners is our top priority.
- All our technicians are fully vaccinated  
- We are implementing best practices based on the latest information from Public Health. 
- Our employees are not sick and not showing any symptoms and did not travel recently.
- We maintain social distancing.
- Our installers are using personal protection equipment while working.


Furnace & AC Experts, one of the leading HVAC company providing installation, repair and service for AC, Furnace, Generator, Water heaters, Boilers and Air Exchangers. Serving business & households in Toronto, Mississauga, Brampton, Vaughan, Oakville and complete GTA region.

Our Mission Statement:
We are a growing team of experts passionately dedicated to identify our customer’s need and provide the best solution in Heating, Ventilation, Air Conditioning and Generator.

Vision:
To be the most reliable, customer oriented, fastest growing heating, air conditioning and Power backup service provider, offering the best price possible, superior installations, maintenance and repair services. To be the best company in terms of value, customer service, employee talent and consistent, profitable growth and giving back in the communities where we live and work.

Our Commitment:
We are committed to providing the highest quality and performance in all aspects of HVAC and Generator service and replacement business.

Services we offer:

- Sell and install Carrier Furnace, Heat pumps, Boilers
- Repair and service Furnace, Heat pumps, Boilers

- Repair and service Central Air conditioners

- Sell and install Generac Generators

- Repair and service Air exchangers

profile: At Appleby Systems, we are focused on your home comfort needs. profile:
Dr. HVAC is a licensed and registered heating and air conditioning company that has been professionally serving Brampton, Mississauga, Caledon, Oakville and the Greater Toronto area for close to a decade.
 
OUR MISSION (WHAT WE DO BEST EVERY DAY)
Our mission is to offer high quality, HVAC solutions that provide our customers with peace of mind.  We take the risk out of products and services that are essential to their lives and businesses.  We make it easy.
 
OUR VISION (WHAT THE FUTURE LOOKS LIKE BECAUSE OF OUR MISSION)
We will change the way people think about our industries by providing vital products and services in innovative ways. Working together we will lead the market in customer satisfaction.
Our technicians are licensed and experienced and all of our staff are knowledgeable and friendly. When you call Dr. HVAC you can depend on us to respond quickly to your needs, make recommendations based on our extensive knowledge, and provide you with complete information before proceeding with any work. We provide Residential and Commercial HVAC services including repairs, maintenance, and installations with friendly service at a competitive price.
Truly an elite group of whom we are very proud. So whether you have home or commercial HVAC problems, contact the pros at Dr. HVAC.


Find out more about us here:

Did you know that there are more than 100 important components in your heating and air conditioning system? And more than 50 things that can go wrong! Some, just a nuisance and some that can spell disaster!

specialities:
Our technicians have had at least five years experience as an apprentice in service, repair and Installation before they’re allowed to work “solo” on a repair. They are graduates of a private HVAC Institute and must participate in continuing technical education programs. They also regularly attend seminars to learn communication, sales, finance, management and marketing skills. They are drug – free, neat in appearance, mindful of their speech and respectful of your property. 
When our technician arrives at your home for an equipment repair, he will not leave until the problem is fixed and you are 100% satisfied.

profile:
About Us
For more than a decade, Eco Star Home Services Co. has dedicated itself in providing affordable and reliable home comfort solutions that every family deserves. We are a leading provider of furnaces, air conditioners, water heaters, water treatment systems, IAQ (indoor air quality) products, home insulation, maintenance and protection plans, and other HVAC (Heating, Ventilation and Air Conditioning) related services. At Eco Star, our goal is not simply selling HVAC products to you. We go above and beyond what you would expect from us. To us, your comfort does not only mean cool air for hot days or warm heats for cold days. It also means your experience in working with us is pleasant and satisfying. With this customer-first focus in mind, we carefully source and build up teams consisting of professional sales, experienced technicians and friendly customer services that you can trust and rely on. Our exceptional service has won us A+ BBB (Better Business Bureau) rating, and Best of 2020 Award from HomeStars. Eco Star serves over thousands of customers annually, and we hope to have you as a customer soon! We sincerely welcome you to visit our brand new 15,000sq feet showroom conveniently located off Hwy 404 and 407, where our friendly sales and customer service team will warmly greet you and answer all your questions. 

Thousands of old and new customers come back to us year after year because of:

Our History
Now, Then and Always, we will be here for you. Eco Star is not a flash-in-the-pan company. Established in 2008, and over the past 12 years, we have grown into a thriving company with a 5 million insurance coverage, and a brand new 15,000 sq feet showroom based in Markham. Our proudest accomplishment is the large number of long-term customers who year after year put their trust in us.

Our Attitude
What sets us apart from the competition is that we're passionate about the products and services we provide and quality of support. Quality is a word being used too often. But here, we mean it. At Eco Star, we listen carefully to customers’ needs and provide the solution most suitable for them. We encourage each other to achieve excellence in all endeavours and aren't satisfied until our customers are satisfied. We always welcome and act on your feedback so we can improve every aspect of our business. 

Our experience
To date, we have successfully provided over 15,000 heating, cooling, water heaters, and other related HVAC solutions to customers across the residential and commercial sectors. This extensive experience managing all types of HVAC projects means we will handle every detail and coordinate all aspects so you can rest assured that your project will be completed on time and on budget. And we don’t settle with “good enough”. Our sales and technicians are provided with continuing education opportunities on a regular basis to allow them to stay current with the latest products and technology. 

Our Support
We all know how frustrating it can be to have a problem and not get the support promptly. Our expert team is here to help you and we strive to provide the best customer service possible. To underscore that statement, on top of our standard, office-based support, available from 9 AM to 6 PM, Monday to Sunday, we take support one step further by offering 24/7 customer service! 

Our One-Stop Service
We handle all aspects of your HVAC related needs. We are here to offer you a one-stop service from finding the right product for your HVAC needs, explaining the rebate process, and arranging a Registered Energy Advisor. We take all stress of going through rebate application. Eco Star Home Services is a participating contractor with a wide variety of heating and cooling incentives programs. Receipt of Eligible Rebates Guaranteed!  We take care of the complicated stuff so you can take care of your family and work.

So, let's get started...
Looking for home comfort solutions? Look no further, give us a quick call at 416-321-8666, or simply send us an email at info@ecostarhomeservices.com to get your HVAC project rolling today. We know you won't be disappointed.

profile:
Currently Offering 6 Months Payment Deferral on all New Installations

Air Purification

The air in your home, for the most part, is the same air being re-circulated over and over again - contaminants included. These contaminants include mold, viruses, pet dander, pollens and household toxins to name a few. There are a variety of options for air purifiers, at all budget levels, that can help you take the next step in a healthier home. LG Home Comfort technicians can guide you through the simplest room solutions right up to whole home air purifiers with hepa filters and UV-C lights. At LG Home Comfort we are confident that we can find an air purification solution for your home.

 

Contact us today to book your air purification installation.

Water Purification

Your homes’ water is an essential part of your everyday life - everything you do in your home requires it! But did you know the quality of your water can also affect the efficiency and lifespan of your appliances? Hard water can cause internal build up of minerals in your washing machine, dishwasher and hot water heater. The level of water purification your home needs depends on the combination of your current water and what outcomes you are looking for.

We offer a full range of water treatment options: softeners, chlorine & iron filters and reverse osmosis units. Allow the LG team to test your water, free of charge, and design a water purification system that gives you the best water possible.

 

Contact us today to book your water purification installation or a complimentary water test.

Heating

Whether you require a tune-up, seasonal maintenance or a new furnace, let our professional team of technicians evaluate your needs and walk you through your heating options. A poorly designed and installed system can lead to low efficiency and increased operating costs - at LG Home Comfort we take the time to customize each installation to ensure peak performance and efficiency.

 

Contact us today to book your tune-up, seasonal maintenance or a new furnace appointment.

Cooling

When it comes to cooling, reliability and consistency is key. Every home is unique, which is why our team will take the time to assess your home, your cooling needs and come up with a solution that fits your needs and your budget.

 

Contact us today to book your AC repair, maintenance or installation appointment.

Water

Installing over 1000 water heaters per month, we are experts at heating your home water. Whether you need a simple repair or a new system, our technicians will walk you through the process and explain your different options. Our no-pressure sales guarantee will ensure that you can make a decision in your own time, with all of the information you need.


Contact us today to book your water heater repair or installation appointment.

profile:
At Tamas Mechanical we offer a broad range of heating and cooling services, as well as furnace repairs in Toronto. 

From installing new furnace and heating units, air conditioners, heat pumps and boilers to ductless air conditioners and attic air conditioner units. 

We install full duct systems and high velocity duct systems. We install air handlers that use hot water to warm air and air handlers that use electric heaters.

Give us a call - 1-866-908-2627

profile:
We have established ourselves as an efficient and professional heating and air conditioning company with over 35 years experience in the HVAC field.

We are a licensed residential and commercial gas, refrigeration and air condition company with training in many manufactured furnace air condition, boiler, ductless and tankless etc.

A & A Heating has also helped provide practical training for young people through Technical Colleges in Ontario.

We provide free quotes and you can visit our showroom at 22 Steinway blvd Unit 20 by appointment only!

profile:
Summers in the city can get very hot, A to Z is here to help you in the heat of it all. You can keep cool with our quick services. No matter when your heat wave strikes, you can count on us for quick repairs from trained quality technicians.

Don’t suffer during the hot summers. Our expert services are readily available around the clock. Call A TO Z HEATING AND COOLING for all your cooling needs in the GTA and surrounding 905 areas.

Keep your home warm during the tough winters with our excellent heating services. Whether your furnace needs repairs or you need one installed you can count on us to keep your home warm.

In the business since 1992, A TO Z HEATING AND COOLING understand and know how to keep your home warm during the long harsh winters. You will get easy scheduling and direct, professional service to work around your schedule.

profile:
Hawk is your local Heating and Air Conditioning contractor. We are proud to serve our community. Hawk has been working tirelessly for our customers to provide them same day solutions. We have multiple HVAC Installation Teams working with us to serve our valued customers with emergency Hvac Installations from Oshawa to Waterloo.  Take advantage of our prompt HVAC service and installation, easy monthly payments with $0 down or a Worry Free Rental agreement. No hassle billing gets added on your Enbridge Bills so you know exactly what you are paying for. There are no Hidden Fees or additional costs associated.  Hawk Mechanical Engineering Services caters your needs for Engineering, Construction, Home Heating and HVAC Services. Having Served more than 5000 households in the GTA for Home Heating and Air Conditioners, Our HVAC, Home Heating and Air Conditioning operations cover Durham, Toronto, York, Peel and Waterloo-Kitchener Region.  

****

If you are looking for a new air conditioner, central air conditioning, furnace or any product related to home heating, gas boilers and commercial HVAC needs. Call us today to book a consultation for free! Our heating and cooling experts will analyze and present you with the best heating and cooling options for you to choose, then take advantage of our quick service for HACV AC and Furnace Install to enjoy a comfortable and cozy atmosphere in your house.

profile:
Welcome to Maintemp Heating & Air Contracting! We're proudly serving the areas of: Serving Hamilton, Oakville, Burlington & Mississauga. There is nothing exciting about having to buy or repair a climate control unit. In fact, it’s often an unexpected and overwhelming experience. We may not be able to make it fun, but we can make it easy.

***

For almost 30 years, Maintemp has made the process of purchasing, servicing or repairing home comfort systems a little easier by offering the best in-class climate control units, paired with a genuine care for our customers and industry-leading guarantees. We’ll take care of the details and provide you with options in plain language. We didn’t say this would be fun, but we can make it easy.

***

Give us a call today to schedule your appointment.

profile:
GreenVerse Systems Inc. is based in Toronto Ontario, proudly servicing the GTA and surrounding areas. Our energetic company employs a team of professional technicians who are on the go, responding quickly and efficiently to any of our customer’s requests.

We provide the experience, expertise, and customer service to design, install, maintain and repair all commercial/residential Heating and Cooling Systems to fit your needs.

GreenVerse was established by a group of professionals with over 15 years of experience in the Heating and Cooling business. We have since been one of the leaders in the HVAC industry in Toronto.

Only the most advanced equipment available in the market is used, for the practical day-to-day Heating and Cooling needs of all the Commercial properties and Canadian homes. Due to the exceptional quality and service provided, GreenVerse Systems Inc. has been growing at an unprecedented rate.

profile:
GS Air Systems is a highly experienced installation and service company which specializes in all areas of the trade. We are a fully insured and licensed company with experienced technicians always ready to perform the highest quality of service. We offer year-round true 24/7 emergency service and peace-of-mind service contracts. We are known in the industry for our expertise in finding innovative, most effective, efficient solutions and a reliable customer service. We pride ourselves in integrity, honesty and our ongoing commitment to continuously improve customer satisfaction.
 
Our staff members go through a demanding selection process that guarantees they will have the understanding, expertise, and technical know-how that we demand, as well as an unmatched dedication to customer service. All of us take great pride in meeting and exceeding our client’s expectations by pulling on our substantial experience in all kinds of heating systems, ventilation, and air-conditioning systems across GTA and Toronto. At GS Air Systems company we work with every customer individually to recognize and implement the heating and air conditioning solution that will perform best for you, your home or your company.
 
Our commitment to high quality and reliability sets us apart from our competition in Toronto / GTA so when you choose to work with GS Air Systems you are guaranteed to receive personal, individual attention and responsiveness to your problems and concerns. We work tirelessly to be the best in everything we do and we invite you to join our long list of satisfied customers in Toronto & the GTA who can attest to the fact that our company is the best service provider of customized, cost-effective heating and cooling products for you and your company.

profile:
Air 2000 Heating and Air Conditioning is a family-owned business with 25 years of HVAC experience. We are a fully licensed, insured, TSSA and WSIB certified HVAC company, serving homeowners in Brampton, Mississauga, Milton, Caledon, GTA, and other surrounding areas. We offer various services such as air conditioning repair and maintenance, air condition sales, furnace repair and maintenance, furnace sales, hot water tank, electrical, tankless repair, and maintenance service, and many other installations, repair, and maintenance services for all the homeowners out there.

Whether you need a quick and simple fix or an extensive repair or replacement, we have the experience and the expertise to make it happen.

At Air 2000, we repair, service and install most major brands of energy efficient furnaces, central air conditioners, hot water tanks and instant (on demand) water heaters, thermostats, humidifiers etc.

As a trusted heating and cooling company, our mission is to always exceed customers’ expectations by analyzing each customer’s unique comfort needs and wants, recommending the best possible heating and/or cooling system to meet efficiency and comfort requirements. We provide personalized, prompt and courteous service at affordable prices.

profile:
Heatpumps.ca is your full-service solution for heating and cooling your home. With over 20 years of industry experience, we get the job done right for you the first time. Heatpumps.ca uses only Mitsubishi Electric, fossil-free ductless heating, and cooling systems. Every unit we install conforms to the maximum energy efficiency standards. 

At Heatpumps.ca, we are conscious of the the impact heating and cooling systems have on the environment. Lowering your carbon footprint has never been easier. While reaching net-zero emissions by 2050 is a noble idea, it isn't a simple matter. Home heating is one of the most carbon-intensive industry sectors. That's why heatpumps.ca uses the most energy-efficient equipment available. With standard systems, you lose up to 50% of your heating and cooling through the ductwork. But with our units, you get more comfort at a lower cost, all while using fewer energy resources and improving your indoor air quality. As we say at Heatpumps.ca, "a greener house is a happier home". 

We're focused on providing full system installations for our customers throughout Toronto and GTA. Our professional, courteous team members will assist you with every step of the process, ensuring complete satisfaction in our services. Our goal is to exceed expectations every day.

profile: Asbuilt Comfort Care delivers sound advice, professional service and installation of reliable heating, cooling, air quality and radiant heat technologies. We carry products from Napolean Quality Fireplaces, Carrier, Schwank, Rehau and Buderus. As a partner with NextEnergy, we are also building a reputation as a leader in geothermal energy solutions. We service all makes and models of Furnaces and Air Conditioners. We install and service Napolean Quality Fireplaces. We install and service Carrier , Schwank, Rehau and Buderus HVAC systems. We install and service High Efficient Heating and cooling systems from Carrier, Schwank, Rehau and Buderus.

profile:
Applewood was established in 1970 and is still proud to be family owned and operated. Applewood is proud to be Canada's largest HVAC contractor that specializes in Total Home Comfort Solutions.
***
Residential and Commercial air conditioning, furnace, gas piping, hot water tank professionals. 24 hour emergency after hour service.
www.applewoodair.com 
Applewood's Mission:
To supply our customers with total home comfort and ensure complete customer satisfaction.
***
Company Overview
Applewood Heating and Air Conditioning
Heating – Air Conditioning – Water Tanks – Fireplaces – Gas Piping  
***
Sales Hours: Monday - Friday: 8 - 5
Saturday: 9 - 12 
***
Brief Overview/ Company History:
Established in 1970 the industry, Applewood Air Conditioning is proud to be Canada’s largest independent HVAC contractor. Applewood is your number one Home Comfort Solution Provider in the GTA! Applewood still remains as a family owned and operated company and is proud to still be today. With over 40 years of experience, Applewood has not only seen but flourished through both the 1982 and 1991 recessions, and will do no different during the economic downturn the new home industry is experiencing today. 
***
The Applewood team continues to thrive through both good and bad times by effectively controlling costs, buying smart, and most importantly by building strong relationships with each and every client we have the pleasure of working for. Applewood has built such strong relationships with our clients in two ways; the first way in which we do that is by showing strong passion for the workmanship provided and also, Applewood has installers that have been with the Applewood team for over 25 years. They know the HVAC industry inside and out, and after 25 years have a strong commitment to their company and their work. The second way we have built such strong relationships with our clients is through commitment and flexibility to their wants and needs. At Applewood we will do everything in our power to ensure that our clients are 110 percent satisfied with the job we have done.
***
Applewood is proud to be the largest energy star contractor in Ontario, also specializing in stacked townhouses and hi-velocity systems, geothermal, alarms, and central vacuum. We offer the most competitive prices in all aspects of our industry whether it’s for production homes, custom homes, or commercial buildings. Along with the best prices, we also provide unbeatable service. Over the past 40 years we have had the pleasure of working with many of the largest builders in the housing industry. Below is a list of some of the builders in which we have had the opportunity of working for on numerous occasions:
***
Arista Homes , Aspen ridge Homes, Beaverbrook Homes,  Beaverhall homes, Eden Oak Homes, Mattamy Homes, Belrock Design, Forest Green Homes, Touchstone Homes,Cachet Homes, Kaitlin Homes, Townwood Homes,
Ballymore Homes, Countrywide Homes, Laurelview Homes, Yorkwood Homes
***
The Applewood team would be pleased to answer any questions you may have. Please do not hesitate to contact us with any pricing inquiries you may have. For future projects, we at Applewood, would be very grateful to have the opportunity to work for you! 
***
www.twitter.com/ApplewoodAirLTD
***

The Mechanical Group has over 10 years of experience in all aspects of plumbing, HVAC, Maintenance, and Service,  including residential, commercial and new construction. We provide the highest quality of service no matter how large or small the job. Our qualified Red Seal, fully insured, fully trusted tradesmen  are more than happy to assist you in any way possible. Our 100% customer satisfaction guarantee is what we live by. 

We like to keep in contact with our clients after every job to ensure satisfaction. We take every measure possible to help our clients save as much money as they can, which is why we have dedicated a full page called Monthly Deals.  Every month we will feature a new product available only to those who take advantage of our 100% satisfaction guaranteed service. So if you’ve been looking for any type of deals on our services provided, then you have come to the right place. 

A company that will not only give you a deal on the service and installation we provide, but we will also go the distance to find our customers the best deals possible on the fixtures of their dreams at an affordable discount. We will provide you with the workmanship and the experience you deserve – guaranteed. If you’re not satisfied, we're not satisfied.

Call us today at 647.430.2181 for a free quote

profile:
A company is only as good as its employees and we only hire the best. First, we exercise strict hiring requirements including background checks and drug testing. All our AC & Furnace Depot sub-contractors are licensed veterans in plumbing, heating, air conditioning and electrical.

Our heating and cooling repair specialists are industry certified by NATE and the T.S.S.A. All our technicians receive constant training in the latest advancements in furnace service, air conditioning repair, drain cleaning, leak detection, sink and bath, toilets, lighting, outlets, and more. You’ll also appreciate their courtesy and professionalism. Our AC&FurnaceDepot® technicians arrive on time, wear shoe covers, use work mats and do a thorough cleanup.

Call us today and see for yourself... 

24 Hour Emergency Cooling Service Repair
We can service any brand of whole house air conditioning or heating system, no matter where you bought it. Whether your system is a Rheem®, Carrier®, Lennox® or any other brand, your local AC & Furnace Depot™ Repair technician has you covered.

What sets AC & Furnace Depot™ repair apart:
Service starting from $75.00* with coupon.
 

24/7 Emergency Service, weekends included

    A call before we arrive to let you know we're on our way
    A complete, written estimate before we begin any work
    Detailed system diagnostics to get to the root of the problem the first time
    The cost of your service call credited towards the purchase of any related HVAC repair
    Satisfaction guaranteed.

Request your Service Appointment


10-Point Check for FurnaceSystems

    Check entire furnace for loose or worn parts, abnormal vibrations and proper venting
    Check the heat exchanger, if accessible
    Check electrical circuit to furnace including thermostat and thermostat wiring
    Check gas valve operation, adjust gas pressure if needed. Check, clean & adjust pilot burner as needed
    Check air filter
    Check ignition system
    Check and lubricate blower motor, clean blower wheel if needed
    Check carbon monoxide emission level
    Check electrical/safety circuits for proper operation
    Operate furnace and adjust for peak operating efficiency

10-Point Check for Central Air Conditioner

    Check overall operation of the air conditioner or heat pump
    Check condenser coils
    Check air filter
    Check evaporator
    Lubricate air handler blower
    Lubricate condenser fan motor
    Check condensate drain lines
    Check refrigerant level
    Check condensate pump operation
    Check for loose parts or unusual vibration

Air Conditioning & Gas Furnace Replacement

The average service life of a whole house HVAC unit is 10-14 years. Is your system past its prime? We evaluate your heating & cooling needs with a free in-home consultation so you get the perfect fit for your house.

services:
Plumbing Services:

Your home comfort rests on more than just heating and cooling. You count on your plumbing — but when it gives you trouble, call AC&FurnaceDepot™and one of our expert plumbers will be right over to resolve any plumbing issue you might have.....Read more

Furnace Repair:
When it comes to furnace repairs in Toronto and greater GTA, be sure that you are with experts and honest hands. Our experienced gas fitters are equipped with fully stocked vans and they will troubleshoot your furnace in less than one hour. Because we carry many furnace parts in our vans, the chance is that you will have a working furnace in one hour. Emergency furnace repairs can be made day or night, 365 days a year.....Read more

Air Conditioning Service:
Air conditioning repair іn уоur home іѕ vеrу important. AC&FurnaceDepot™ offers thе bеѕt variety іn air conditioning repair, A/C solutions аnd service for residential аnd commercial. Wіth оur excellent customer care wе guarantee 100% satisfaction.....Read more

AC&FurnaceDepot™ provide the highest quality electrical maintenance, installation, and repair to Ontario residents and businesses. We sell, install and service electrical equipment for single family homes, condominiums, offices, stores, and commercial buildings...
